p: On the other hand, the EO extracted using HD from the above-ground parts of T. polium inhibited the seed germination, shoot growth, and root growth of lettuce by 51.9%, 31.4%, and 54.4%, respectively, at a concentration of 1000 μL L −1, while the EO extracted using MAE method reduced the seed germination, shoot growth, and root growth of lettuce by 50.9%, 39.8%, and 42.3%, respectively ( Table 2).
